code: @Override protected void decode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, AddressedEnvelope<Object, InetSocketAddress> msg, List<Object> out) throws Exception {     if (msg.content() instanceof ByteBuf) {         ByteBuf payload = (ByteBuf) msg.content().         Object result = delegateDecoder.decode(ctx, payload).         AddressedEnvelope<Object, InetSocketAddress> addressEvelop = new DefaultAddressedEnvelope<>(result, msg.recipient(), msg.sender()).         out.add(addressEvelop).     } else {         LOG.debug("Ignoring message content as it is not an io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf instance.").     } }
